# People

## Team Members

### Alice Chen
- Role: Senior Engineer
- Focus: Backend systems, distributed computing
- Prefers: Direct communication, code reviews over meetings

### Bob Smith
- Role: Product Manager
- Focus: User experience, roadmap planning
- Prefers: Written specs, async updates

### Carol Davis
- Role: Tech Lead
- Focus: Architecture, mentoring
- Prefers: Pair programming, design docs
